data.title: OMG! Did You know? TV actor Sanaya Irani never want to work with hubby Mohit Sehgal on-screen; read to know
data.meta_description: MUMBAI: Telly actress Sanaya Irani is a prominent Indian television, movie and web series actress who has left behind quite a long and prominent trail of hers in the showbiz industry.Irani hails from a Mumbai-based Parsi household and had harnessed seven years of her former education from an Ooty-based boarding school. Following this, she graduated from the Sydenham College of Commerce and Economics, Mumbai and was further pursuing an MBA degree before entering into the glamour world for modelling.  | Tellychakkar.com
data.text:
MUMBAI: Telly actress Sanaya Irani is a prominent Indian television, movie and web series actress who has left behind quite a long and prominent trail of hers in the showbiz industry.

Irani hails from a Mumbai-based Parsi household and had harnessed seven years of her former education from an Ooty-based boarding school. Following this, she graduated from the Sydenham College of Commerce and Economics, Mumbai and was further pursuing an MBA degree before entering into the glamour world for modelling.

Irani made her acting debut in Bollywood with her 'accidental' cameo role in the famous Yash Raj Film's movie Fanaa (2006), that starred Aamir Khan and Kajol as the lead actors, while she played the supporting role of Mehbooba.

She has also participated in many reality shows like Nachle Ve with Saroj Khan, Meethi Choori No.1, Welcome - Baazi Mehmaan-Nawaazi Ki, Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 8, Aaj Ki Raat Hai Zindagi, Box Cricket League 2, Nach Baliye 8 (contested with husband Mohit Sehgal), Kitchen Champion 5 and Khatra Khatra Khatra and has claimed prominent positions in most of them.

Sanaya Irani and her husband Mohit Sehgal never fail to give us major couple goals.

The duo is almost inseparable, and their social media accounts are proof of their love.

But did you know? Sanaya Irani once went on record to said that she never wants to work with Mohit Sehgal on-screen.

Well, in an interview Sanaya revealed the reason behind it, and stated, “I keep telling Mohit that we shouldn't work together because I feel at some time, couples start taking each other for granted. I value what I have with him at home more than making money with you onscreen.”

Sanaya and Mohit are not like regular couples, they believe in their love and hence, they worked hard to strike a perfect balance between their professional and personal life. Once in an interview, Sanaya had stated, "Sometimes when we don’t spend time together, Mohit gives me surprises like flowers, breakfast in bed, date nights and the like."

Also read: Check out the prominent on-screen roles of telly actress Sanaya Irani

Stay tuned to this space for more updates and gossips.
